title: Fleja (A item resale website)
description2: Email and password authentication, Google authentication,
description3: In the home page, There are banner categories of products, advertise and footer
description4: Logged in buyer can book his/her products and in the dashboard they can buy the products by paying. a buyer can report a product.
description5: Logged in seller can advertise his/her products in the home page there is button in the dashboard for seller. A seller can add his/her product under the specific category. After adding a product it will automatically redirect to my products page from there a seller can delete his/her adding product.
description6: An admin can manage all. In admin dashboard an admin can manage all the buyers, all the sellers, and reported items by a buyer and can delete them all. an admin can make a buyer admin.

title: Avijatrik (A tour guide review system)
description1: Review related website including review adding feature
description2: Showing reviews for individual services and removing and editing personal review form review page
description3: Anyone can add services and it will appear in the service page
description5: Email and password authentication, Google authentication,
description6: Mongodb is used for storing the data.
description7: You can give your review for the individual service and you can see the others review also.

title: Edu Tech
description1: Educational website including authentication login and register
description2: Getting premium access client needs to login or register first
description3: Downloading the course details in a PDF format with one click
description5: This website has private route. Without login or register you cannot proceed.
description6: This website has pdf feature. You can download your pdf with one click
